Text: Request for Assistance with Interviewing Cc a request for your interview participation The Associate and Analyst Programs will be on the Harvard MBA campus interviewing summer ASSOCIATE interns next week Due to business reasons previously scheduled interviewers from the Harvard team have had to cancel their participation or couldnt schedule participation Currently I need additional interviewers for Tuesday February th and an interviewer for Wednesday February th These trips would require an arrival the night before Please let me know of your availability Campus interviews are scheduled as follows Place Harvard School of Business The Charles Hotel Date Tuesday February th Wednesday January Day One Interviews Day Two Interviews Time am am Please contact me for further details In the event that you have scheduling conflicts and cannot participate any referrals at the Director or VP level would be greatly appreciated As always thank you for your time and please contact me ext if you have any questions Paul LeBeau Recruiter

Request for Assistance with Interviewing Cc a request for your interview participation The Associate and Analyst Programs will be on the Harvard MBA campus interviewing summer ASSOCIATE interns next week Due to business reasons previously scheduled interviewers from the Harvard team have had to cancel their participation or couldnt schedule participation Currently I need additional interviewers for Tuesday February th and an interviewer for Wednesday February th These trips would require an arrival the night before Please let me know of your availability Campus interviews are scheduled as follows Place Harvard School of Business The Charles Hotel Date Tuesday February th Wednesday January Day One Interviews Day Two Interviews Time am am Please contact me for further details In the event that you have scheduling conflicts and cannot participate any referrals at the Director or VP level would be greatly appreciated As always thank you for your time and please contact me ext if you have any questions Paul LeBeau Recruiter

NYU STERN MBA Admissions Office Reception Cc Please join Dean George Daly Associate Dean Mary Miller and area alumni and find out why New York Universitys Stern School of Business can take you where you want to go MBA Program Information Session Houston Wednesday November pm Enron Allen Center Smith Street th Floor The Forum Houston TX Special thanks to Enron for generously sponsoring this event Space is limited and will be filled in order of response Please RSVP via email fax or our Web site Fax Please include the city name daytime telephone number and email address Email Please include the city name as the subject and your name daytime telephon e number and email address in the message Web site wwwsternnyuedumbaadmissionsfulltimerecruit Click on RSVP Please include the city name as the subject and your name daytime telephone number and email address in the message

RE Any SuggestionsThanks for the response I will remind you on Monday Worse case I can do the behavioral or one of the first rounders can stay over an extra day The interviews are two min back to back One on one Thank you sir and I will keep you posted Paul L Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A Sent Saturday October PM To Lebeau Paul Subject RE Any Suggestions If the interviews are on one then Im ok with only one interviewer Remind me to look around on monday Original Message From Lebeau Paul Sent Friday October PM To Shankman Jeffrey A Cc Marvin Michele Nezi Subject Any Suggestions Hello Jeff Kevin McGowan has cancelled as second day interviewer at Wharton I was wondering if you had anyone that could spare us time or anyone in mind I could contact Thanks for the help Paul L

Wharton Grad Interview Team Cc Hello Jeff Here is the list of participants for Grad Interviews Oct Jayshree Desai Michele NeziMarvin Evan Betzer Betsy Basis Sarah WesnerSoong TBD Looking for replacement for Neville Kevin McGowan John Enerson Ranabir Dutt Charles Ward When we find a replacement I will let you know Actually do you know of any one who might be a good interviewer Thanks for your support Paul L

Interviewers for U Penn Undergrad Cc Hello Jeff The following people are here in Philly interviewing for the Program Christie Patrick Li Sun Chris Hilgert Jen Fraser Beth Jenkins Mark Santikos Mike Harris Lara Leibman Tom Barkley Sarah Mulholland Let me know who you would like for him to meet with I actually meet with him last night at out reception We had a really good turn out for the reception I will keep you posted with the results Thanks Paul L

RE Enron FullTime PositionHe is a Grad student we are trying to get him on the schedule on Oct th I will keep you posted Thanks Paul L Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A Sent Monday October PM To Lebeau Paul Cc Commons Matthew Subject FW Enron FullTime Position Importance High Did you guys see this guy Original Message From Divgi Aditya ENRON Sent Friday October AM To Shankman Jeffrey A Subject Enron FullTime Position Importance High Dear Mr Shankman Hows it going As you may remember I met you Mr LeBeau Ms Leibman and Ms Li Sun at Cavanaughs with Matt Commons a few weeks ago During that meeting you suggested that I visit Enron down in Houston in the next few weeks As I have not been placed on the closed interview list at Wharton I was wondering if I could conduct the interview process while in Houston Please see my updated resume attached for your review Please let me know if this would be possible I am still very interested in obtaining a fulltime position in the Associate Program at Enron Kind regards Edward Divgi Attachment Resume Resume Aditya Edward DIVGI Wharton MBA doc File Resume Aditya Edward DIVGI Wharton MBA doc

RE RE Thank You Cc Jeff I have just returned from U Penn recruiting and it was a very successful trip In response to Aziz Fakirs email he was interviewed by Christie Patrick and Chris Hilgert on st rounds and was passed onto nd rounds He was their top candidate However during second rounds interviewing with Jen Frazer and Sarah Mulholland he was not passed onto SuperSaturday From talking to Jen and Sarah he did not rank as high as other candidates did We interviewed people for second rounds All of the candidates were topnotch and the competition was staunch We are bringing back Analyst for Final Rounds in Houston I can provide you with the evaluations of Aziz and if you want to bring him down we can Jen also meet with Jonathan Tyburski and she feels that we should renew his offer I will let our office know and we will start the paperwork Please let me know your decision Thank you Paul LeBeau Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A Sent Wednesday October PM To Lemmons Jr Billy Patrick Christie Warner Traci Cc Lebeau Paul Subject RE RE Thank You I had a Jeff Original Message From Lemmons Jr Billy Sent Wednesday October PM To Patrick Christie Warner Traci Cc Shankman Jeffrey A Lebeau Paul Subject RE RE Thank You christiethx for the noteand for doing the interviewsfor the record i have no problem whatsoever with a gpa especially from a school like whartonim disappointed out that we have an interviewer making a big deal out of that with a candidatethx billy Original Message From Patrick Christie Sent Wednesday October PM To Warner Traci Lemmons Jr Billy Subject Fw RE Thank You B and T I interviewed this guy yesterday as did Chris Mcant remember his last name but hes a Director in Compression Svs Group For the record but not to interfere with or prejudice the process both Chris and I felt Aziz was hands down the best of about candidates we interviewed Paul does not have a blackberry or I wd sendthis msg to him Thks christiem Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet Original Message From Fakir Aziz ENRON NOTESFakir Aziz ENRON To Patrick Christie Christie NRONcom Sent Wed Oct Subject RE Thank You Hi Christie I just received your response and tried calling to thank you for interviewing me yesterday Your personal and prompt email is truly representative of Enrons ability to not only hire but also retain the best and the brightest Up until today I have found no recruiter to bring out the problematic issues of a firm The very fact that you put Enrons current problems on the table shows how strongly and genuinely you feel about the firm being secure and stable I really appreciated you letting me defend Enron it not only shows you my passion but also reiterates my genuine interest in the firm I am writing to let you know that I had second rounds today as you know and in the first interview which was supposed to be conducted by Jen Fraser but was conducted by Matt a first year analyst the concern was on GPA and academic performance rather that what value I can add or my keen interest in the firm I was extremely shaken after this first interview in the interview right after Sarah an associate did manage to alleviate some of my concerns However I was wondering if this could possibly serve as a road block in the recruiting process as I really do not believe that my GPA is low or an accurate representation of my capabilities to perform on the job I honestly feel that a at Wharton equates to a much higher GPA at any other school in the United States Although disheartened I am extremely interested in Enron as a firm and am confident that if given the chance I will emerge as one of your most valued candidates Thank you so very much Sincerely Aziz

Any Suggestions Cc Hello Jeff Kevin McGowan has cancelled as second day interviewer at Wharton I was wondering if you had anyone that could spare us time or anyone in mind I could contact Thanks for the help Paul L

RE Post Interview Meeting Decision Making Meeting Cc Yes sir Do you have anyone from your group or someone you know who can interview Thanks Paul L Original Message From Mcgowan Kevin Sent Friday October PM To Lebeau Paul Subject RE Post Interview Meeting Decision Making Meeting I may not be able to go on the recruiting trip due to urgent business matters Will this completely screw you up KJM Original Message From Lebeau Paul Sent Friday October AM To Marvin Michele Nezi Betzer Evan Bassis Betsy Desai Jayshree Sun Li Lindvall Tim Mcgowan Kevin Enerson John Ward Charles Dutt Ranabir Cc Herasimchuk Alyse Subject Post Interview Meeting Decision Making Meeting Hello Interview Team We are planning on meeting on October st at am in C to discuss our choices for SuperSaturday Please RSVP for the meeting ThanksPaul LeBeau

Wharton Interview Team Oct Cc The following individuals have been slotted for interviews at Wharton Reception and First Rounds Oct Oct Jayshree Desai Interviewer Michele Marvin Interviewer Evan Betzer Interviewer Betsy Bassis Interviewer Sarah Wessner Interviewer Neville Ravji Interviewer Paul LeBeau Recruiter Second Rounds Oct Kevin McGowan Interviewer John Enerson Interviewer Randy Peterson Interviewer Chuck Ward Interviewer Ranabir Dutt Interviewer Paul LeBeau Recruiter Please let me know ASAP if your schedule has changed and you can not participate If you can not participate we would need for you to find a replacement If you have someone in mind that can fill your slot please let me know An event sheet will be forwarded shortly Thank you Paul LeBeauRecruiter
U Penn InterviewsHey Jeff I was wondering if you were planning on being in Philly for the interviews If so I was wanting to make sure we had a room for you Let me know Thanks Paul L

Corporate Presentation Cc Hey Jeff The Associate Analyst Program is trying to confirm who is doing the presentation at all of the schools I have blocked the dates on your calendar with Jennifer Burns per your request Just wanted to confirm with you if these dates are good for you Please let me know at your earliest Thank you Paul LeBeau

Added Georgetown Candidate Cc Hello Team Please add one more Georgetown MBA to your list for SuperSaturday The candidates info is Jennifer YiLing Lin She was interviewed by our team at the Black MBA Conference and it was determined that she should come down for Supersaturday If you could treat her as a campus recruit it would be greatly appreciated I will forward her resume Thanks Paul L

Need a Little HelpHello GT Team I am interviewing at Wharton and Stern NYC next week we are in a bind I am in need of interviewers last minute cancellations Need Wharton Second Rounds Oct th Need One NYU First Rounds Nov Need Two If you are available please let me know Thanks Paul L

Georgetown Strategic PlanningHello Gentlemen I have attached the Georgetown Recruiting Schedule Not all of the items have been set there is room for change We will need to set aside some time for the five of us to sit down and discuss our recruiting efforts Please let me know what your schedule looks like next week for a meeting Upcoming events Careers Extrav Sept th Bill W Brown VP EIM sitting on Panel David Howe Jay Sparling Paul LeBeau Finance Day Sept th Chip Schneider VP in Risk Analytics Case Study at Lunch Jeff Soo Manager in Risk Analytic Case Study at Lunch Ray Bowen Possible Panelist David Howe working on this Paul LeBeau Presentation Jim Steffes Tentative Presentor Team members AJ Brancaccio Enron Summer Intern Pres of Finance Day mentioned to me on the phone yesterday that the other panelist were manger or rd year Assoc He had suggested that someone like Jay Sparling or Kirk Neuner could be panelist Something to talk about I am also sending out a team email for Presentation and Interviews It will go out today or Friday Thanks Paul L

RE Gtown New Hire Cc Hello Team Here is some info about our starting class Emel Akan Working with Andy Kelemem EIM Transaction Development Commercial Juan Canavati Enrique Velasco Working with Connie Estrems EES Costing Teseo Bergoglio Working with Martha Stevens Enron Corp Southern ConeRisk Mgmt Andrea Gonzales Working with Carl Tricoli ECT Resources Corp NAGeneration Investments James Willis Working with Frank Vickers ECT Resources Corp East Gas Origination Calvin Xu Working with David Gorte Enron Corp RAC Yoselyn Malamud Working with Jim Wood EES Consumer Products Jason Jennaro Working with Gregg Cooper EES Wholesale Utility Risk Mngmt Thanks Paul L

Georgetown Recruiting Season is Upon Us Cc RECRUITING SEASON IS UPON US WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT As you know employing quality recruits has been a key to Enrons continued growth and success and assisting with this effort is everyones responsibility Therefore we urge each of you to set aside some dedicated time to make our campus recruiting effort successful Clearly oncampus interviewing is the most critical event but participation in the outings and presentations is also key to our overall message Below are the dates that we will be on campus Presentation Tuesday Sept th pm Carr Barn Interviews Reception st Round MondayTuesday Oct th th nd Round Wednesday Oct th Please email me with your availability Thank you in advance for your support and participation Paul LeBeauRecruiter X Alyse HerasimchukRecruiting Coordinator Embedded Picture Metafile
